item.title: Multiple flags attached to street lights, 17th September
item.description:
At least 4 flags attached to street lights in central reservation

item.title: TMC - Defects - Vegetation problem, 17th September
item.description:
Cut back approx 3m of shrubs growing out of base of tree on roundabout centre - 28 days - Standard TM as space for gang to work safety on roundabout centre. (Overgrown Hedge)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: There is a Tesco shopping trolley in the next driveway to us ..has been dumped here which is annoying., 17th September
item.description:
The Tesco shopping trolley has been here a week. Tesco's is a long way from here... very annoying. We are 3 Cromwell Road Cheltenham. Also there is a big bed base going rotten and mildrew opposite us next to the modern townhouses. We have spoken to the neighbour ..he took away the bed stead but left the base. It's a danger because it falls down and obstructs the pavement opposite me when I take the dog for my a walk. Very annoying as it's been there for a month.... both trolley and bed base are an eyesore to the neighbourhood ....
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 43, Cromwell Road, Lynworth, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Blocked Drains Pine Needles - Cheltenham Road B4632, 17th September
item.description:
A concerned resident has requested an update. Tewkesbury Borough Council is investigating the frequency of street sweeping along this section of the road. In addition, the drains in this area need regular unblocking by GCC, as the accumulation of pine needles is preventing proper surface water run-off and causing localised flooding.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 39, Cheltenham Road, Winchcombe, Winchcombe
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Wide pothole much larger than dinner plate, 3-4cm deep near drain cover opposite Pickering Close entrance. When buses or heavy vehicles pass, our house (1 Orchard Rd) actually shakes., 17th September
item.description:
Pothole was repaired earlier this year, thank you, but has now reopened and widened. We are on a bus route (W), opposite Pickering Close. Our house at 1 Orchard Rd literally shakes when buses or waste disposal vehicles hit the pothole. I am concerned about damage to our house fabric.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Orchard Road, Winchcombe, Winchcombe
Report on FixMyStreet
